com.jefflunt.movers
Interface Actor

All Known Implementing Classes:
Accelerator, Mover, Pedestrian
public interface Actor

Actors are the base class for anything that must take an action periodically.

Method Summary
 void act()
          Causes the actor to act.
 void think()
          Causes the actor to think about what they need to do next.
 

Method Detail

think

void think()
Causes the actor to think about what they need to do next. Generally you should think before you act.

act

void act()
Causes the actor to act.
